Text: Happy ThanksgivingI just wanted to sincerely wish all of you a very happy and safe Thanksgiving with your families Thanks to all of you for helping me build my business this year Carol Measom Tom James Company of Houston Post Oak Place Drive Houston Texas ext wwwtomjamescocom Learn more about me at aspbiopageaspempidn

Can you help meI was wondering if you might be able to help me I need to finish strong this year I am attempting to reach the goal of in clothing sales by the end of the year Obviously no single client will be able to help me do this So I was wondering if you might be able to help me out by giving me the names of some qualified gentlemen or ladies that might be interested in the type of service we offer Some things to consider We offer readymade off the rack clothing as well as custom We offer all types of mens clothing including casual If you know of some mid to upper level executive women they may have an interest as well Some memory joggers Who is the best dressed man or woman you know Who do you know that likes nice cars Who do you know that owns their own company Who do you know that is successful in sales Who do you know that wears an expensive watch Who do you know that owns their own airplane Who do you know that might have a hard time fitting in typical clothing Thanks for your help Carol Measom Tom James Company of Houston Post Oak Place Drive Houston Texas ext wwwtomjamescocom Learn more about me at aspbiopageaspempidn

The New Season for Clothing is HerePST I just wanted to touch base with you to let you know that the new season clothing line is in The focus this season is on color Basic colors for suits sport coats and trousers are highlighted with a splash of color in shirts to give you a new youthful but distinguished look Fabrics are light and airy for the warmer climate ahead Dont forget to make room for a home run suit Even if you dont wear suits every day you need at least one that makes a BIG impression For more about the new line please call me or email me to make an appointment Thanks Carol Measom Tom James Company of Houston Post Oak Place Drive Houston Texas ext wwwtomjamescocom Learn more about me at aspbiopageaspempidn

MovingPST Just to give you a heads up the Tom James of Houston office will be moving to a new location on February We have bought a building and our beautiful new office will be located in the Brookhollow area close to and Our new information Tom James Company of Houston Directors Row Houston TX new phone new fax Please note the change in phone number will be effective FEBRUARY We will be sending you written notification of our move closer to the moving date If your address has changed since we last met please be sure to forward it to me so that I can notify you Thanks and Happy New Year to you Carol Measom Tom James Company of Houston Post Oak Place Drive Houston Texas ext wwwtomjamescocom Learn more about me at aspbiopageaspempidn
